Class Student

java.lang.Object
User
Student
public class Student extends User
Represents a student object within the CAMS System, extends User class functionality

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    Student(String name, String userID, String password, Faculty facultyInformation)
    Creates a student object with a name, userID, password, and faculty.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String userID, String password, Faculty facultyInformation)
      Creates a student object with a name, userID, password, and faculty. Inherits from User
      Parameters:
      name - This is the name of the Student
      userID - This is the students userID
      password - This is the students password to access CAMS
      facultyInformation - This is the students faculty that they are a part of

  • Method Details

    • viewAvailableCamps

      public CampList viewAvailableCamps(CampList campList)
      Method to view all available camps to a Student, through checking for vacancies, faculty, and visibility
      Parameters:
      campList - The main camplist of all camps
      Returns:
      a camplist of available camps to students

    • returnAvailableCamps

      public CampList returnAvailableCamps(CampList campList)
      Method to return all available camps that a student is eligible for.
      Parameters:
      campList - The main camplist of all camps
      Returns:
      camplist That a student may take part in

    • viewRegisteredCamps

      public void viewRegisteredCamps(CampList campList)
      Method for a student to view all the camps they have registered for (as a camp committee member, or as a participant)
      Parameters:
      campList - A list of all camps

    • withdrawCamp

      public boolean withdrawCamp(Camp camp, CampList campList)
      Method to withdraw a student from a camp. It checks if student is registered, before withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp that the student is a member of
      campList - The main camp List
      Returns:
      True if successfully withdrawn, else false.

    • checkWithdraw

      public boolean checkWithdraw(Camp camp)
      Method for checking if a Student has withdrawn from a camp in the past.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp that is being checked for student withdrawal
      Returns:
      False if a student has been withdrawn from the camp before, else true.

    • checkCampDeadline

      public boolean checkCampDeadline(Camp camp)
      Method to check a camps registration deadline
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp being checked for its deadline
      Returns:
      True if current date is before camp deadline

    • checkCampClash

      public boolean checkCampClash(Camp camp, CampList campList)
      Method to check is a students camp registration clashes with any other camps they have registered for
      Parameters:
      camp - Main camp a student is registering for
      campList - List of Camps that a student has also registered for
      Returns:
      True if there is a clash, False otherwise.

    • isCampRegistered

      public boolean isCampRegistered(Camp camp, CampList campList)
      Method to deetermine if a student has registered for a specific camp, as a committee member, or as a participant
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp that they have registered for
      campList - To cross check with all other camps student has registered for as a participant
      Returns:
      True if Student has registered for the camp, false otherwise
